M10Robot:AirRaid.NAME: Air Raid
M10Robot:AirRaid.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times.
M10Robot:AirRaid.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X + !M! times.

M10Robot:AmmoBox.NAME: Heavy Caliber
M10Robot:AmmoBox.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Loaded Attacks apply !M! Vulnerable to their targets.

M10Robot:Ascension.NAME: Ascension
M10Robot:Ascension.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of combat.
M10Robot:Ascension.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

M10Robot:AssaultField.NAME: Assault Field
M10Robot:AssaultField.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to random enemy !M! times. NL Gain !M10Robot:SecondMagic! m10robot:Recoil.

M10Robot:AssemblyLine.NAME: Assembly Line
M10Robot:AssemblyLine.DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! m10robot:Present. NL Upgrade all your Orbs !M10Robot:SecondMagic! times. NL Exhaust.

M10Robot:AttackDown.NAME: Attack Down
M10Robot:AttackDown.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Swappable. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

M10Robot:DefenseDown.NAME: Defense Down
M10Robot:DefenseDown.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Swappable. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

M10Robot:Atomize.NAME: Atomize
M10Robot:Atomize.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Lock-On to ALL enemies. NL Channel !M! m10robot:Bomb. NL Exhaust.
M10Robot:Atomize.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Lock-On to ALL enemies. NL Channel !M! m10robot:Bomb.

M10Robot:AutoCaster.NAME: Auto Caster
M10Robot:AutoCaster.DESCRIPTION: The first Orb you Channel each turn is Evoked.
M10Robot:AutoCaster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first !M! Orbs you Channel each turn are Evoked.

M10Robot:BalanceCurrents.NAME: Balance Currents
M10Robot:BalanceCurrents.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each power you have.

M10Robot:BatteryPack.NAME: Battery Pack
M10Robot:BatteryPack.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Store X charges. NL Right Click to spend a charge to gain [E] . NL Charges: !M10Robot:CurrentAmmo! / !M!

M10Robot:BriefRespite.NAME: Brief Respite
M10Robot:BriefRespite.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card.
M10Robot:BriefRespite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards.

M10Robot:Compensator.NAME: Compensator
M10Robot:Compensator.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, reduce m10robot:Recoil by !M!.

M10Robot:Concentration.NAME: Sturdy Structure
M10Robot:Concentration.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain m10robot:Recoil, gain !M! Block.

M10Robot:DividedAttention.NAME: Divided Attention
M10Robot:DividedAttention.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Lock-On to ALL enemies. NL Draw !M10Robot:SecondMagic! card.
M10Robot:DividedAttention.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Lock-On to ALL enemies. NL Draw !M10Robot:SecondMagic! cards.

M10Robot:DoubleCaster.NAME: Double Caster
M10Robot:DoubleCaster.DESCRIPTION: The first Orb you Evoke each turn is Evoked twice.
M10Robot:DoubleCaster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first !M! Orbs you Evoke each turn are Evoked twice.

M10Robot:EMP.NAME: EMP
M10Robot:EMP.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! m10robot:Stasis to ALL enemies.

M10Robot:EmptyBuffer.NAME: Empty Buffer
M10Robot:EmptyBuffer.DESCRIPTION: Evoke all your Orbs !M! time. NL Exhaust.
M10Robot:EmptyBuffer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Evoke all your Orbs !M! times. NL Exhaust.

M10Robot:Engage.NAME: Engage
M10Robot:Engage.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and Lock-On. NL Draw !M10Robot:SecondMagic! card.
M10Robot:Engage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and Lock-On. NL Draw !M10Robot:SecondMagic! cards.

M10Robot:EvasionDown.NAME: Evasion Down
M10Robot:EvasionDown.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and Lock-On to ALL enemies.

M10Robot:FeedForward.NAME: Feed Forward
M10Robot:FeedForward.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage increases by !M! this combat for each subsequent card played this turn.

M10Robot:Filter.NAME: Filter
M10Robot:Filter.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust any number of cards. NL Gain [E] for each card exhausted this way.
M10Robot:Filter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exhaust any number of cards. NL Gain [E] for each card exhausted this way.

M10Robot:FullAuto.NAME: Full Throttle
M10Robot:FullAuto.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times. NL Gain !M10Robot:SecondMagic! m10robot:Recoil.

M10Robot:HealthDown.NAME: Health Down
M10Robot:HealthDown.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! HP and Max HP.

M10Robot:HomeSweeper.NAME: Home Sweeper
M10Robot:HomeSweeper.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Deals !M! more damage per turn passed.

M10Robot:ImaginaryNumbers.NAME: Imaginary Numbers
M10Robot:ImaginaryNumbers.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! temporary Strength and temporary Dexterity. NL Exhaust.
M10Robot:ImaginaryNumbers.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! temporary Strength and temporary Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

M10Robot:Juggling.NAME: Juggling
M10Robot:Juggling.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Next turn, draw an additional card.

M10Robot:Loopcaster.NAME: Loopcaster
M10Robot:Loopcaster.DESCRIPTION: Modifications: NL + !M! m10robot:Echo NL Requirements: NL Can be played
M10Robot:Loopcaster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Modifications: NL + !M! m10robot:Echo NL Requirements: NL Can be played

M10Robot:MagicTinkering.NAME: Magic Tinkering
M10Robot:MagicTinkering.DESCRIPTION: Modifications: NL + !M! m10robot:Primary NL Requirements: NL Has a m10robot:Primary
M10Robot:MagicTinkering.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Modifications: NL + !M! m10robot:Primary NL Requirements: NL Has a m10robot:Primary

M10Robot:Malfunction.NAME: Malfunction
M10Robot:Malfunction.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Lose !M10Robot:SecondMagic! HP. NL Exhaust.

M10Robot:PileDriver.NAME: Pile Driver
M10Robot:PileDriver.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !D! damage to a random other enemy.

M10Robot:PolishingKit.NAME: Polishing Kit
M10Robot:PolishingKit.DESCRIPTION: Modifications: NL + !M! damage NL + !M! Block NL Requirements: NL Has Block or damage

M10Robot:PowerSavings.NAME: Power Savings
M10Robot:PowerSavings.DESCRIPTION: Draw one less card for !M10Robot:SecondMagic! turns. NL At the start of your turn, gain

M10Robot:QuickRepair.NAME: Quick Repair
M10Robot:QuickRepair.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and half that much Temporary_HP. NL Exhaust.

M10Robot:RAMUpgrade.NAME: RAM Upgrade
M10Robot:RAMUpgrade.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Channel an Orb, Upgrade it !M! time.
M10Robot:RAMUpgrade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Channel an Orb, Upgrade it !M! times.

M10Robot:RapidAssembly.NAME: Rapid Assembly
M10Robot:RapidAssembly.DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! m10robot:Present. NL Gain !M10Robot:SecondMagic! m10robot:Components. NL Exhaust.

M10Robot:RecoveryMode.NAME: Recovery Mode
M10Robot:RecoveryMode.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.

M10Robot:RecklessAttack.NAME: Reckless Attack
M10Robot:RecklessAttack.DESCRIPTION: Modifications: NL + !D! Damage NL Gain !M! m10robot:Recoil Requirements: NL Deals damage

M10Robot:ReflectiveShell.NAME: Reflective Shell
M10Robot:ReflectiveShell.DESCRIPTION: Fully blocked attacks are reflected onto the attacker !M! time.
M10Robot:ReflectiveShell.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Fully blocked attacks are reflected onto the attacker !M! time.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Fully blocked attacks are reflected onto the attacker !M! times.
Innate. NL Fully blocked attacks are reflected onto the attacker !M! times.

M10Robot:Repeater.NAME: Repeater
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Accepts ALL #yBoosters. NL While Equipped: NL Plays the effect of equipped #yBoosters at the beginning of your turn.

M10Robot:ReturningShield.NAME: Returning Shield
M10Robot:ReturningShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block and draw an additional card.

M10Robot:RoboBeam.NAME: Robo Beam
M10Robot:RoboBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Repeat for every three turns that have passed this combat.

M10Robot:Rumble.NAME: Rumble
M10Robot:Rumble.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain !M! temporary Strength.

M10Robot:SaleTag.NAME: Sale Tag
M10Robot:SaleTag.DESCRIPTION: Modifications: NL + !M! Refund NL Requirements: NL Non-zero cost
M10Robot:SaleTag.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Modifications: NL + !M! Refund NL Requirements: NL Non-zero cost

M10Robot:Salvo.NAME: Salvo
M10Robot:Salvo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Channeled Orb.

M10Robot:ScrambleField.NAME: Scramble Field
M10Robot:ScrambleField.DESCRIPTION: This turn, the target is unable to deal over !M10Robot:SecondMagic! damage and unable to gain over !M10Robot:SecondMagic! Block.

M10Robot:ScrapBooster.NAME: Scrap Booster
M10Robot:ScrapBooster.DESCRIPTION: Modifications: NL + !M! Block NL Requirements: NL Has Block

M10Robot:ScrapeOff.NAME: Scrape Off
M10Robot:ScrapeOff.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain m10robot:Components equal to unblocked damage dealt.

M10Robot:SecretRootkit.NAME: Secret Rootkit
M10Robot:SecretRootkit.DESCRIPTION: Modifications: NL + m10robot:Unrestricted NL Requirements: NL one Cost or greater
M10Robot:SecretRootkit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Modifications: NL + m10robot:Unrestricted NL Requirements: NL one Cost or greater

M10Robot:SelfDestruction.NAME: Self Destruction
M10Robot:SelfDestruction.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! m10robot:Recoil.

M10Robot:SlotConversion.NAME: Slot Conversion
M10Robot:SlotConversion.DESCRIPTION: While Equipped: NL Gain !M! Orb slots.

M10Robot:SpectralCannon.NAME: Spectral Cannon
M10Robot:SpectralCannon.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

M10Robot:SpikeBall.NAME: Spike Shell
M10Robot:SpikeBall.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! m10robot:Spikes. NL Gain !M10Robot:SecondMagic! m10robot:Recoil.

M10Robot:SpikyPlating.NAME: Spiker Form
M10Robot:SpikyPlating.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! m10robot:Spikes.

M10Robot:SplitBeam.NAME: Split Beam
M10Robot:SplitBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

M10Robot:SubroutineDefend.NAME: Subroutine: Defend
M10Robot:SubroutineDefend.DESCRIPTION: Modifications: NL Gain !B! Block NL Requirements: NL Can be played

M10Robot:SubroutineDraw.NAME: Subroutine: Draw
M10Robot:SubroutineDraw.DESCRIPTION: Modifications: NL Draw !M! card NL Requirements: NL Can be played
M10Robot:SubroutineDraw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Modifications: NL Draw !M! cards NL Requirements: NL Can be played

M10Robot:SubroutineStrike.NAME: Subroutine: Strike
M10Robot:SubroutineStrike.DESCRIPTION: Modifications: NL Deal !D! damage NL Requirements: NL Can be played

M10Robot:TargetingSystem.NAME: Targeting System
M10Robot:TargetingSystem.DESCRIPTION: At the beginning of your turn, apply one Lock-On to a random enemy !M! time.
M10Robot:TargetingSystem.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the beginning of your turn, apply one Lock-On to a random enemy !M! time.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: At the beginning of your turn, apply one Lock-On to a random enemy !M! times.
Innate. NL At the beginning of your turn, apply one Lock-On to a random enemy !M! times.

M10Robot:ThermalImaging.NAME: Thermal Imaging
M10Robot:ThermalImaging.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Swappable. NL Apply !M! Lock-On to ALL enemies. NL Channel !M10Robot:SecondMagic! m10robot:Searchlight.

M10Robot:HeatSeekers.NAME: Heat Seekers
M10Robot:HeatSeekers.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Swappable. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Channel !M10Robot:SecondMagic! m10robot:Searchlight.

M10Robot:ThornField.NAME: Thorn Field
M10Robot:ThornField.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! m10robot:Spikes.

M10Robot:Turbo.NAME: Turbo
M10Robot:Turbo.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next !M! turns, draw an additional card and gain [E] . NL Exhaust.

M10Robot:WaveGenerator.NAME: Wave Generator
M10Robot:WaveGenerator.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

M10Robot:WeaponPlatform.NAME: Weapon Platform
M10Robot:WeaponPlatform.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies with Lock-On.

M10Robot:WeaponPoison.NAME: Weapon Poison
M10Robot:WeaponPoison.DESCRIPTION: Modifications: NL Apply !M! Poison NL Requirements: NL Is an Attack

M10Robot:WeaponPolish.NAME: Weapon Polish
M10Robot:WeaponPolish.DESCRIPTION: While Equipped: NL Playing an attack boosts its damage by !M! this combat.

M10Robot:WideAngle.NAME: Wide Angle
M10Robot:WideAngle.DESCRIPTION: Modifications: NL Card becomes multi-target NL Requirements: NL Is single-target

M10Robot:WindUp.NAME: Wind Up
M10Robot:WindUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Increase the damage of ALL *Wind *Up cards by !M! this combat.
